original_text: Great troubles will happen to people at that time. Nothing as bad has ever happened before, since the beginning of the world. Nothing as bad will ever happen again.
korean_text: 이는 그 때에 큰 환난이 있겠음이라 창세로부터 지금까지 이런 환난이 없었고 후에도 없으리라

sentences.original_text: Great troubles will happen to people
Nothing as bad has ever happened before
sentences.korean_translation: 그처럼 나쁜 일은 일찍이 일어난 적이 없었다

sentences.original_text: since the beginning of the world
Nothing as bad will ever happen again
sentences.korean_translation: 그처럼 나쁜 일은 다시는 일어나지 않을 것이다
